meanings.definition: A single eyebrow that extends across the forehead.
meanings.sent1: Her unibrow made her look unique.
meanings.sent2: He had a prominent unibrow that he never plucked.
meanings.sent3: The unibrow above his eyes seemed to connect his thoughts.
meanings.sent4: Her unibrow was like a bridge between her expressive eyes.
meanings.sent5: The unibrow on his face was impossible to miss.

meanings.definition: A thick, continuous line of hair above the eyes.
meanings.sent1: The unibrow on the man's face was quite bushy.
meanings.sent2: She decided to embrace her natural unibrow and not tweeze it.
meanings.sent3: The unibrow above her eyes looked like a fuzzy caterpillar.
meanings.sent4: His unibrow was a dark streak against his fair skin.
meanings.sent5: The unibrow added a touch of wildness to her appearance.
